question: What is the output of the following code?
What is the output of the following code?
What is the output of the below program if the user enters 11?
code:
num=int(input("Enter a whole number: "))
if num%2 == 0:
	print("Remainder of",num,"modulo 2 is 0")
	print(num,"is an even number.")
else:
	print("Remainder of",num,"modulo 2 is 1")
	print(num,"is an odd number.")
print("Thank you")
answers:
Remainder of 11 modulo 2 is 0
11 is an even number
Thank you

Remainder of 11 modulo 2 is 1
11 is an even number
Thank you

Remainder of 11 modulo 2 is 1
11 is an odd number
Thank you

Remainder of 11 modulo 2 is 0
11 is an odd number
Thank you
